original_title: I do it for the Sparrow and the Mouse
overview: The Kangra Valley of Himachal Pradesh has a living tradition of the age-old water distribution system regionally called 'kuhls'. The custodians of the kuhls, or water-channels are the 'kohlis'. This film follows contemporary kohlis and their struggles in keeping the system alive.
tagline: Kangra Valley's old age water distribution system explored by Amit Dutta
title: I do it for the Sparrow and the Mouse
